data.text: @hrw Please, pay attention to the situation of forgotten #AfghanRefugees in Kyrgyzstan. The forgotten Afghan refugees in Kyrgyzstan are desperately waiting for your kindness, please open your hearts ♥️, take our hands and save our lives.🙏🆘
@hrw Stop requiring only vaccinated be tested for border crossings. That is a Trump era anti-immigration law which has been repurposed. WHO never recommended limits on travel.
@hrw Indian picture used out of context, where Indian population is more vaccinated then US as of today. Lies!
